first_post.title: First post
first_post.author: Kielx
first_post.content:
This is my first post. 
 I created this blog to help myself write about the stuff I learned. Today I decided that I will create a blog to keep myself accountable for the process of learning programming. I decided to learn programming because I'm tired of my current job. I had and objective to learn programming for past few years and actually tried to do it, but unfortunatley I either did quit for a few times or couldnt get out of tutorial purgatory. Therefore after many failed attempts I decided to finally overcome all the obstacles and after 4 years from now or less become a programmer. Why 4 years and not 10 years? Or maybe better 4 months? Because I also decided to start studying for my CS degree. Why now? Because there's no better time to start than today. Therefore I decided to start working on CS degree and commit to work for at least an hour a day on programming. This blog is supposed to help me get started and force me to work so I wont abandon this great idea again. It will allow me to practice many skills - coding while building the whole app, create first meaningful project, work on my writing and english skills, help myself organize during the progress and many more. I just hope that I won't stop after few days/weeks...

second_post.title: Second post
second_post.author: Kielx
second_post.content: This is my second post. I plan to update it as soon as I get some more time.
